issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException on ORC tables after adding a struct field

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently, the OrcInputFormat uses the file's schema rather than the reader's schema. This means that SchemaEvolution fails with an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if a partition has a different schema than the table.
fields.summary: Fix OrcInputFormat to use reader's schema for include boolean array

comments.body:
GitHub user omalley opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/110

    HIVE-15124. Fix OrcInputFormat to use reader's schema for include boolean array

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/omalley/hive hive-15124-master

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/110.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #110
    
----
commit b5ca81f31eb5a27911b1d692d8eaf4e4f6dc695d
Author: Owen O'Malley <omalley@apache.org>
Date:   2016-11-04T17:45:56Z

    HIVE-15124. Fix OrcInputFormat to use reader's schema for include boolean
    array.

----

The logic looks good to me. +1
Will be good to have some test cases.
This is the patch from the pull request.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12839838/HIVE-15124.patch
